column5: I was reading september is a good time to catch big black crappie. Any ideas where to go and places to stay. I might go myself or possibly one other person house keeping plan and rental boat. Thanks
CAMP NARROWS on rainy would be a good start
I havent been up to Rainy in over 25 years...but I have to say that they have the biggest crappies I have ever seen in my life..almost like they are mutations...lot of fun on light gear

The big crappies in Rainy are real big I have three mounted from Rainy biggest 17" in the fall Black Bay is the spot and a good place to stay wood be Woodys guide service in Ranier he has rooms and boats and you can hire him for a half day and he can put you on fish. Google Woodys Guide service
